original_text: Do not keep in your house two different bowls to measure things, one big one and one small one.
korean_text: 네 집에 두 종류의 되 곧 큰 것과 작은 것을 두지 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: Do not keep in your house
two different bowls to measure things
sentences.korean_translation: 물건을 재기 위한 두 개의 다른 그릇을
